Sentencas: Widespread commercial implementation of the solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) systems is hindered by their high cost, insufficient durability and poor reliability.
Titulo: Performance degradation analysis and fault prognostics of solid oxide fuel cells using the data-driven method

Sentencas: Fault prognostics of these systems are extremely difficult due to the complicated interactions of their constituting components.
Titulo: Performance degradation analysis and fault prognostics of solid oxide fuel cells using the data-driven method

Sentencas: This paper proposes a data-driven method of fault prognostics of SOFC systems based on the voltage signal.
Titulo: Performance degradation analysis and fault prognostics of solid oxide fuel cells using the data-driven method

Sentencas: The voltage signal is first decomposed into a trend component and several fluctuation components with the empirical mode decomposition (EMD).
Titulo: Performance degradation analysis and fault prognostics of solid oxide fuel cells using the data-driven method

Sentencas: The minimal-redundancy-maximal-relevance criterion (mRMR) is then applied to determine the most relevant fluctuation component.
Titulo: Performance degradation analysis and fault prognostics of solid oxide fuel cells using the data-driven method

Sentencas: A Gauss mixture model with different humps is obtained from the distribution of the trend component and the fluctuation component in different periods.
Titulo: Performance degradation analysis and fault prognostics of solid oxide fuel cells using the data-driven method

Sentencas: Finally, the similarity of different humps is calculated and adopted as the health indicator (HI).
Titulo: Performance degradation analysis and fault prognostics of solid oxide fuel cells using the data-driven method

Sentencas: A fault warning is successfully issued approximately 70 h in advance.
Titulo: Performance degradation analysis and fault prognostics of solid oxide fuel cells using the data-driven method

Sentencas: Meanwhile, the validity of the proposed method is confirmed by the measured microstructure and element distribution at different degradation stages using the scanning electron microscopy (SEM) and energy dispersive X-ray detector (EDX).
Titulo: Performance degradation analysis and fault prognostics of solid oxide fuel cells using the data-driven method

Sentencas: These results demonstrate that the proposed method can predict the fault occurrence during the SOFC operation.
Titulo: Performance degradation analysis and fault prognostics of solid oxide fuel cells using the data-driven method
